title: ICE 'allocation missing in dead_alloc_map' in rustc_mir::interpret when compiling Servo

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-nightly
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from stable to nightly.

labels.name: I-unsound
labels.description: Issue: A soundness hole (worst kind of bug), see: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Soundness

labels.name: NLL-complete
labels.description: Working towards the "valid code works" goal
